net.identio.saml

Class Assertion

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.identio.saml.SignableSAMLObject
      • net.identio.saml.Assertion

  • public class Assertion
extends SignableSAMLObject
    Represents a SAML assertion. This object can only be constructed through an AssertionBuilder.
    Author:
    Loeiz TANGUY
